channel.title: Staff of *** help ;D
channel.description:
im trying to make a staff witch allows you to cast high and low alch for free ;D
how do i do that ;D
source : Davidscape v7,0, 508

item.title: Staff of *** help ;D
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

[quote=“rrooaarr, post:6, topic:425078”]Replace with this, but switch the ###'s with your highest player rights before staff. so if mod is 3 make it 2.

[code]switch (spellID) {
case 570474496: // High-Alchemy
if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
if (magicLvl§ >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 5)) {
gfa(p, 113, 713);
if (playerRights <= ###) {
deleteItems(p, fire, 5, nature, 1);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
addItem(p, 995, 2);
magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[34]);
p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;
}

                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[34]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;

    case 218152960: // Low-Alchemy
        if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
            if (magicLvl(p) >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
                if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 3)) {
                    gfa(p, 112, 712);
                    addItem(p, 995, 2);
           if (playerRights <= ###) {
                    deleteItems(p, fire, 3, nature, 1);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
                    magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[12]);
                    p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;
                    }
                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[12]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;[/code]

all that this does, is make it so that runes are only deleted if you are not a staff member, quite self explanatory[/quote]

erm do you have fb or msn ? ;D

and btw it work

Read full topic

item.title: Staff of *** help ;D
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

Replace with this, but switch the ###'s with your highest player rights before staff. so if mod is 3 make it 2.

[code]switch (spellID) {
case 570474496: // High-Alchemy
if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
if (magicLvl§ >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 5)) {
gfa(p, 113, 713);
if (playerRights <= ###) {
deleteItems(p, fire, 5, nature, 1);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
addItem(p, 995, 2);
magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[34]);
p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;
}

                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[34]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;

    case 218152960: // Low-Alchemy
        if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
            if (magicLvl(p) >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
                if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 3)) {
                    gfa(p, 112, 712);
                    addItem(p, 995, 2);
           if (playerRights <= ###) {
                    deleteItems(p, fire, 3, nature, 1);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
                    magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[12]);
                    p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;
                    }
                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[12]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;[/code]

all that this does, is make it so that runes are only deleted if you are not a staff member, quite self explanatory

item.title: Staff of *** help ;D
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

rrooaarr:

find where the spell is for me, and then i can write out your code

\DavidScape V7.0\DavidScape\players\magic thats where it is ;D

switch (spellID) {
case 570474496: // High-Alchemy
if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
if (magicLvl§ >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 5)) {
gfa(p, 113, 713);
deleteItems(p, fire, 5, nature, 1);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
addItem(p, 995, 2);
magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[34]);
p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;

                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[34]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;

    case 218152960: // Low-Alchemy
        if (p.magicDelay <= 0) {
            if (magicLvl(p) >= modernLvlReq[0]) {
                if (hasReq(p, nature, 1) && hasReq(p, fire, 3)) {
                    gfa(p, 112, 712);
                    addItem(p, 995, 2);
                    deleteItems(p, fire, 3, nature, 1);
                    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemID, itemSlot, 1);
                    magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[12]);
                    p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt;
                } else {
                    sendMsg(p,
                            "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell.");
                    p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
                }
            } else {
                sendMsg(p,
                        "You need level " + modernLvlReq[12]
                        + " magic to use this spell.");
                p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
            }
        } else {
            sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again.");
            p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay;
        }
        break;
